text: Balaton is the largest lake in Hungary and in Central Europe. Every year many tourists come to Balaton from Germany. There are many places to be visited. Balaton is a shallow lake, because its average depth is 3.2 meters and its maximum depth is 12.2 meters. The northern part of Balaton is deeper than the southern part. The so-called capital of the Lake Balaton is Si√≥fok. During the summer the streets are full of life, and at night there are several discos. == Images == File:LakeBalaton1.jpg|View from Siofok File:LakeBalaton2.jpg|View from Tihany ==References== Category:Lakes of Hungary
title: Balaton
